widget.name: Scrolled Into View Detector
widget.description: Triggers either 'set a boolean' or 'trigger an event' when the widget's DIV is scrolled into view.

property.caption: Debug Mode?
property.description: When Active, the widget's DEV will be visible, and the browser's console will display when code is triggered. TURN OFF BEFORE COMMITTING!

property.caption: Set a Boolean?
property.description: Set the attribute when the widget's DIV is scrolled into view? False means the action is triggered.

property.caption: Boolean to Change
property.description: The attribute that will be changed to true when the widget's DIV is scrolled into view.

property.caption: Scrolled Into View Action
property.description: Action triggered when the widget's DIV is scrolled into view.
